title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-06] [Guided Setup] [$250] Login - "Here is your magic code" appears briefly before the abracadabra page
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Start logging in with a new Gmail account
2. Copy the magic link, paste it to iCloud notes and add "staging" to it
3. Open it from iCloud notes

Expected result: Only the abracadabra page should show.

Actual result: None
